body_html:
I think our current implementation approximates the derivative. I have a high-precision digamma function here: #3955 that I'll rebase soon.

edit: Nevermind, I'm not sure which would have higher precision. this is our current implementation: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/TH/THMath.h#L132-L145.

body:
I think our current implementation approximates the derivative. I have a high-precision digamma function here: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/3955 that I'll rebase soon.

edit: Nevermind, I'm not sure which would have higher precision. this is our current implementation: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/TH/THMath.h#L132-L145.
